verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
One day soon
I'll be with You (Whoa)
One day soon
When life is through (Whoa)
I'll go home (go home)
To be (to be)
Forever You ooohhhhh

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Suddenly in the blink of an eye
We'll be caught up
To meet him in the sky
So don't cry if you're feeling way down
We're gonna kiss this world good-bye!
(Smooch, Smooch, smooch)
